```{r}
# Pis and priors
pis <- c(0.1, 0.25, 0.4)
priors <- c(0.2, 0.45, 0.35)

# Number of trials and successes
n <- 7
k <- 1

# Likelihoods
likelihoods <- dbinom(k, size = n, prob = pis)

# Unnormalized posterior probabilities
unnormalized_posteriors <- likelihoods * priors

# Normalized posterior probabilities
unnormalized_posteriors / sum(unnormalized_posteriors)
```
